description: Doing conversational practice with students is time-consuming for language teachers. In 72 hours, we built and launched a product called Duck & Cat where teachers can create their own AI roleplay scenarios and automatically generate content from students' responses.
Thinking of gift ideas is hard. So we built Gifty.ai, an voice-activated AI agent to guide through choosing the perfect gift for that perfect someone.

Standups are outdated. So we built Agility.ai, an AI project manager for outsourced dev work, that tracks GitHub and Jira tickets, talks to devs about their progress using voice, and escalates blockers. 100 remote devs = 1 human manager.
In 2 weeks, pitched SkillScale, an AI-automated hiring pipeline for recruiters.
Created an AI agent to find restaurants and order food with DoorDash on the Relevance AI platform.

hackathon: Build Club x Tutero AI EdTech Hackathon
description: Built 'StudyBuddy AI' - an app that watches your webcam ðŸ‘€ and sends a personal AI-generated video message to you to remind you to get back on track.

Built an app where users can take a photo of their receipt, and have it be translated into a nutrition summary, with AI providing feedback and generating a revised shopping list for the next grocery run.
Built outLANDish.ai, a tool that uses AI agents to build a personalised landing page for selling B2B products to targeted customers.
Created 'Blink Camera' - a photo booth that only takes photos when people's eyes are blinking.
Built Voluntario, an AI-powered platform that connects people to volunteering opportunities of their interest.
Developed PoC of 'OmniSearch', a better way to search in the SC platform. Finalist, and chosen as 1 of 5 ideas to be turned into production.

Developed an Apple Watch integration to ensure safety of lone workers, with rapid shift sign-on, location tracking, panic alarm, and creation of tasks with voice. Turned into actual project for senior mobile engineers.
